# AVAssetExportPresetAppleM4A

**Global Variable**

A preset to export an audio-only MPEG 4 Audio file with appropriate iTunes gapless playback data.

## Declaration

```swift
let AVAssetExportPresetAppleM4A: String
```
title: AVAssetExportPresetAppleM4A
